title: Street Cart Chicken and Rice
ingredients:
1 lb chicken thighs,boneless
5 g salt
5 whole cloves
5 g cumin seeds
2 g dried oregano
20 cranks black pepper
3 cloves fresh garlic
1/4 lemon
30 g mayonnaise
200 g basmati rice
 250 g chicken broth
15 g butter
1/8 onions, finely diced
5 g cumin seeds
5 g turmeric powder
5 g smoked paprika
1-2 bay leaves
salt
100 g mayonnaise
50 g greek yogurt
10 g white vinegar
1/4 lemon
10 cranks of black pepper
a sprinkle dried oregano
a sprinkle smoked paprika
salt
100 g water
50 g white vinegar
15 g cayenne pepper
5 g red pepper flakes
1/2 lemon juice
10 g sugar
salt
